358700.name: 3d Bridges
358700.description:
Construct/ Invent! very unique bridges in a physics based world.
Drive a truck yourself. Combine the building needs with your driving skills.
New and more varying leveldesign.

with complete Tutorial campaign!
30 Campaign level
7 Playgrounds

3d Bridges is a daugther project of 3d Engineers on Steam (3de).
3de is including 3d Bridges + adds engineering functionality and an enhanced interface. It is having a different concept and is early access.
358700.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
